name: Temple of the Tentacle
description:
You play as a brave (bald) adventurer, exploring parts unknown! By chance you discover an ancient temple in the jungles of the new world. Here, you meet a weird tentacle creature. Use your trusty grappling hook to traverse the Temple of the Tentacle!

Credits:

James Nunes - Programmer / Level Design

John Suereth - Gameplay Programmer

Kaylin Beck - Artist

Assets Used:

https://freesound.org/people/JarredGibb/sounds/219478/
https://opengameart.org/content/puzzle-tune-1
https://opengameart.org/content/mystical-theme
https://github.com/Brackeys/2D-Character-Controller
